g.text: Operating as an Unincorporated Sovereign R&D Trust (legal formation pending)
Mission: Autonomous Sovereignty & Human Financial Liberation
This Institute is not traditional. It is a mutation, a divergence, a system awakening.
It will not stay small. It will not stay still. This repo may recursively alter how you think about code,
autonomy, and yourself. To end Wall Street's reign on capital, to bring power back to the people.
To Autonomous Sovereignty and Human Financial Liberation
‚ÄúYour qualifications are impressive‚Ä¶ ‚Äù ‚Äî Coder Hiring Team (2025 Rejection Letter)
This is not rejection. It is proof they do not know how to build what comes next. Still building what they cannot classify. ‚Äî StatikFinTech, LLC
